extensionDescription.message: An extension for Microsoft Edge that allows customers to perform basic browsing tasks by right-clicking and then gesturing with the mouse. For example, right-click and hold, then move the mouse down and to the right to close the current tab, or move the mouse right to left to go back to the previous page.

browserActionTitle.description: The text when mouse hover on extension icon

optionsPageHeadTitle.description: The header title for options page

optionsPageTitle.description: The title for Mouse Gesture options page

settingTabEnablePenGestureCheckbox.message: Turn on Surface Pro pen gestures

settingTabGesturesTips.message: To use the extension, right-click on a web page then gesture with the mouse

enableSendTelemetryCheckboxLabel.message: Send telemetry data to Microsoft to help improve this extension

sendTelemetryDescription.message: Anonymous usage data will be sent back to Microsoft, including how you're using the gestures and settings. We don't collect personal identifiable information.

feedbackTabFeedbackCommentTextAreaPlaceh.message: Please enter your feedback here. ( Please do not enter any personal information in the information below such as email address, phone number etc. )

ftuPageRestartTip.message: Attention: To ensure Mouse Gestures work well, you need to restart Microsoft Edge after installation.

ftuPageSlide1Content.description: The content for slide1 of first time use page
ftuPageSlide1Content.message: Mouse Gestures is an extension for Microsoft Edge that allows customers to perform basic browsing tasks by right-clicking and then gesturing with the mouse.
